DOC.brief_title: A Phase I Study Evaluate Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics ( PK ) , Pharmacodynamics ( PD ) , Food Effect AMG 357 Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy Adult subject 25 55 year old Body mass index ( BMI ) 18 32 kg/m2 Normal clinically acceptable physical examination , clinical laboratory value , ECG Additional inclusion criterion apply Any history evidence clinically significant disorder , condition disease would pose risk subject safety . Additional exclusion criterion apply
